content.text:
# 2025 Portland State Vikings football team

The 2025 Portland State Vikings football team represents Portland State University as a member of the Big Sky Conference during the 2025 NCAA Division I FCS football season. The Vikings are led by eleventh-year head coach Bruce Barnum and play at the Hillsboro Stadium in Hillsboro, Oregon.
Big Sky prediction poll
The Big Sky Conference released its preseason prediction poll on July 17, 2025. The Vikings were predicted to finish 10th in the conference.
